Their offensive scheme should create problems, while defensively they match up well. The offensive line play will be crucial, and the team that wins the turnover battle likely wins the game.

The Angle

Weather conditions should favor the running game and Under. The injury report is definitely a factor in this one.

The Bottom Line

I'm taking Baltimore Ravens 7.5. This is one of my strongest plays of the week. I'm confident in this pick.

Confidence: 90%

The Line

This line screams trap game to me. This is essentially a pick'em game, but the 1.5-point spread tells a story. The public is all over the favorite, which immediately makes me want to go the other way.

The Matchup

The key to this game comes down to a few critical factors. New England Patriots has significant advantages on both sides of the ball. Their offensive scheme should create problems, while defensively they match up well. The offensive line play will be crucial, and the team that wins the turnover battle likely wins the game.

The Angle

This could be a letdown spot for New England Patriots after their last performance. Perfect conditions for an offensive showcase. The injury report is definitely a factor in this one.

The Bottom Line

I'm taking New England Patriots +1.5. This is one of my strongest plays of the week. Lock it in and don't look back.
